metadata.title: CVE-2017-9435 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr ERP/CRM before 5.0.3 is vulnerable to a SQL injection inuser/index.php (search_supervisor and search_statut parameters).

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
